name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan

name: Hilali & Khan
transelator_en_name: Muhammad Taqi-ud-Din al-Hilali and Muhammad Muhsin Khan
text: Except those who believe (in Islamic Monotheism) and do righteous good deeds, and recommend one another to the truth (i.e. order one another to perform all kinds of good deeds (Al-Ma'ruf) which Allah has ordained, and abstain from all kinds of sins and evil deeds (Al-Munkar) which Allah has forbidden), and recommend one another to patience (for the sufferings, harms, and injuries which one may encounter in Allah's Cause during preaching His religion of Islamic Monotheism or Jihad, etc.).
